# AudioHardwareCreateAggregateDevice(_:_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Core Audio ](/documentation/coreaudio)

- [ AudioHardwareCreateAggregateDevice(_:_:) ](/documentation/coreaudio/audiohardwarecreateaggregatedevice(_:_:))

-  AudioHardwareCreateAggregateDevice(_:_:) 

Function# AudioHardwareCreateAggregateDevice(_:_:)

iOS 7.0+iPadOS 7.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.9+

```
func AudioHardwareCreateAggregateDevice(
    _ inDescription: CFDictionary,
    _ outDeviceID: UnsafeMutablePointer<AudioObjectID>
) -> OSStatus
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/coreaudio/audiohardwarecreateaggregatedevice(_:_:)#parameters)

`inDescription`The CFDictionary that specifies how to build the AudioAggregateDevice. The supported keys are described in the AudioAggregateDevice Constants section.

`outDeviceID`The AudioObjectID of the newly created AudioAggregateDevice.

## [Return Value](/documentation/coreaudio/audiohardwarecreateaggregatedevice(_:_:)#return-value)

An OSStatus indicating success or failure.

## [Discussion](/documentation/coreaudio/audiohardwarecreateaggregatedevice(_:_:)#discussion)

This routine creates a new AudioAggregateDevice using the provided description.
